name: Space Raze
description:
The Game

In Space Raze you commandeer a spacefighter to destroy evil pirate space ships who guard a weapon of MASS DESTRUCTION!!!. This destructive weapon shrinks SPACE TIME. Enemy ships will keep on warping in to the shrinking space. These enemies will drop energy. This energy is used to power your expansion cannon. If shoot at the core of the weapon you can reverse its effect and the space will EXPAND. Watch out and dont get Razed into pieces.

There is a online scoreboard so be sure to submit your score and become a Space Raze Master.

Controls
  • The spaceship will face the cursor.
  • Arrow keys to move the spaceship around.
  • With the left mouse button you can fire your spaceships blaster. 
  • With the right mouse button you can fire your expansion cannnon.
  • Press escape to bring the pause menu up on the screen.
  • Dont trust the crosshair.
